rules_text:
Creatures you control have “{T}: Add one mana of any color.”
Whenever you cast a spell, if four or more mana from nonland sources was spent to cast it, you may cast a copy of Odayaka's back face without paying it's mana cost. X equals the amount of mana from nonland sources spent to cast that spell.
rules_text2: Search your library for a creature card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor_text2: [i]Odayaka represents selfless nurturing, and believes in the growth in all things.[/i]
